short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track product prices and get notified when they drop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price Tracker is a user-friendly app that monitors product prices across major online retailers like Amazon, Walmart, and Best Buy, alerting you instantly when prices drop on items you're interested in. It works by allowing users to simply paste product URLs into the app, which then checks prices daily and sends notifications when there's a sale or price reduction.

This extension enables you to add products for tracking from any webpage you are browsing.
